sentences.en: a notepad by the phone for messages
sentences.cn: 电话机旁用于记录信息的记事本

sentences.en: Application: Magazine, book, flyer, notebook, stationary paper, envelope, notepad , coated base paper, NCR base paper.
sentences.cn: 用途: 杂志, 书籍, 广告传单, 记事本, 信纸, 信封, 便条纸, 涂布原纸,NCR原纸.

sentences.en: As the words begin to flow, the ideas will come from the shadows and let themselves be captured on your notepad or your screen.
sentences.cn: 当语言开始流畅，想法就会从阴暗处涌现出来，呈现在你的笔记本或者电脑屏幕上。

sentences.en: As the words begin to flow, the ideas will come out from the shadows and let themselves be captured on your notepad or your screen.
sentences.cn: 随着话语开始流淌，思想也会逐渐明朗化，使自己呈现在你的笔记本或者屏幕上。

sentences.en: Bring extra r é sum é s, notepad, pen and so on.
sentences.cn: 携带额外的简历 、 笔记本 、 笔等.

sentences.en: Carry a notepad and pen or pencil with you to jot down ideas.
sentences.cn: 随身带有记事本和钢笔或铅笔以记下你的主意.

sentences.en: Close Notepad and save your changes when prompted.
sentences.cn: 关闭记事本并保存更改提示时.

sentences.en: Have a pencil and notepad ready.
His lunch did not take long to arrive and found him poring over a notepad covered with scrawls.
sentences.cn: 不久午餐就送来了，当时他正埋头于一本满是潦草字迹的记事簿。

sentences.en: Line numbers - you can display the line numbers in Professional Notepad.
sentences.cn: 在线人数 - 您可以显示行号在专业记事本.

sentences.en: My school requires that every student have his own notepad.
sentences.cn: 我们学校要求每个学生都要有笔记本电脑.
用记事本简化您的代码!

sentences.en: The following demo shows how to redirect a user mode notepad debugging session into kernel.
sentences.cn: 下面的demo演示了如何把notepad的调试冲定向到核心态.

sentences.en: To exit Notepad click Exit on the File menu.
sentences.cn: 退出记事本,在文件选项菜单中点击退出.

sentences.en: VC developed using the Notepad program, very worthwhile for us learn.
sentences.cn: 用VC开发的记事本程序, 非常值得大家借鉴.

sentences.en: Write in your journal, write on you blog, write on your notepad.
sentences.cn: 你可以在日记本上、博客上或记事本上写。

sentences.en: Your notepad is best kept out of the interviewee line of vision.
sentences.cn: 最好将笔记本放在被访谈者视线外.

sentences.en: Your notepad is best kept out of the interviewee's line of vision.
sentences.cn: 最佳将笔记本放在被访谈者视线外.

trans.tran_en: a group of sheets of paper fastened together, used for writing notes
